SELECT r.id, r.`name` as roleName, GROUP_CONCAT(rm.`menu_id`) AS menuIds, r.`create_time`, u.`name` createBy
FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON r.`id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON r.`create_by` = u.id
and r.`delete_flag` = 0
and r.name like CONCAT('%',#{roleName},'%')
GROUP BY r.id
